list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a traveler on a public or private conveyance other than the driver, pilot, or crew.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: more than 50 passengers escaped injury when a train was derailed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hơn 50 hành khách thoát khỏi chấn thương khi một chuyến tàu bị trật bánh
